dct_title_s: A new map of South America, from the latest authorities
dct_alternative_sm: A new map of South America, from the latest authorities
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures.; Probably plate no. 32 from Carey's general atlas, 1814.; Prime meridians: London and Philadelphia.; Borders outlined in color.; Imprint from dealer's note pencilled on verso.; "32" pencilled on map.
